fullText: The new musical adaptation of Billy Wilder's classic 1959 comedy manages to update the material for contemporary audiences while preserving much of what made the original so enduring.
dtliExcerpt: The new musical adaptation of Billy Wilder's classic 1959 comedy manages to update the material for contemporary audiences while preserving much of what made the original so enduring.
